data.text: @SeivwrightTrudy @jjchamie I agree. Also, Israel allowed experimentation on its own people. I don’t think the outcome is going to be good given the list of adverse reactions.
@RSmytheFreed @jjchamie In my *opinion* , the  Israeli experiment has been an abject failure. If it wasn’t , they wouldn’t be allowing the unvaccinated into their country.

@SeivwrightTrudy @jjchamie I was just gonna say that. The countries that couldn’t afford vaccines are so much better off/healthier than wealthy countries that forced 3-4 jabs. Israel swallowed Pfizer hook, line and sinker; I worry what’s gonna happen to its people.
@jjchamie IVM is the answer here https://t.co/80TLTEc4U7
@jjchamie 😂Sometimes, there are advantages to being poor.
